About

Get in Touch

For general enquiries, fire us an email at info@farmhousefest.com. We'll try to turn around an answer in a reasonably quick time frame, but bear with us if it takes a bit longer cause we're a small crew.

Press

Please include "MEDIA" in your subject line, and send an email to info@farmhousefest.com; note that media passes are not available.

Volunteers

There will be limited opportunity to volunteer at Farmhouse Fest. If you're interested, include "VOLUNTEER" in your subject and send an email to info@farmhousefest.com telling us why you're awesome. Preference will be given to those with Serving It Right certification.

You Should Come To This Festival

With a beautiful venue, great breweries, and limited attendance, you don't want to miss the festival everyone will be talking about this summer.
